attributes.action: Do not put UK military personnel on the ground in Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to make it clear to the Prime minister that he should not make any commitments to Ukraine unless there is a clear Government majority and the majority should be based on a referendum of the people's of this Great Nation.

If the people Vote for it that is one thing But for a Prime minister who has the lowest approval rating for a long time to Unilaterally decide to put us in a position to cause WW3 is undemocratic at best and outright narcissistic and Dangerous at worst.
attributes.background: I want the government to commit to not putting Troops on the ground in Ukraine under any circumstances,  America is trying to get a peace deal in place and this Government is interfering in the process and could cause a nuclear conflagration.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705814
